DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study collect safety data ALFALASTIN® infusion perform home out-of hospital location .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Alfalastin ( Human Alpha-1 Antitrypsin ) Administered Home
DOC.detailed_description: Non interventional , observational , longitudinal , prospective , multicenter , non comparative study .
DOC.criteria: Participation Criteria : Patients 18 y.o , suffer severe form primary alpha1 antitrypsin deficiency , phenotype PiZZ PiSZ pulmonary emphysema , currently treat per routine practice , week , ALFALASTIN® home outofhospital location sign informed consent .
